code: import{PEER_TYPES}from"../types/peerTypes";var peerReducer=function peerReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:null;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case PEER_TYPES.PEER:return action.payload;default:return state;}};export default peerReducer;
